spatial_accuracy.notes: Door placements and orientations are largely incorrect. Window placements are also frequently incorrect, with some being missing entirely. Room proportions are distorted in several areas, particularly the kitchen and hallway near Bed-2's toilet. Wall alignment shows some minor deviations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness consistency is poor in several areas, with some walls appearing significantly thicker than others. Door embeddings are incorrect, with many doors represented as simple cutouts or missing their frames. Adjacency relationships are generally maintained, but specific bathroom layouts deviate. The 'C.TOI' next to BED-2 is missing in the 3D render.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement accuracy is acceptable in primary rooms like Living/Dining and bedrooms, but much of the smaller furniture and fixtures in toilets and kitchen are either misplaced or not accurately represented. Scale consistency is fair, but some items appear slightly off.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness is fair, but the projection isn't perfectly orthographic, leading to some perspective distortion. Lighting quality is basic and uniform, lacking realistic shadows or highlights. Geometry is mostly clean, but some edges appear soft or indistinct. Visual clarity and composition are decent, but could be improved with better lighting and shadow rendering to define spaces.

detected_errors.description: Missing the door to 'C.TOI' near BED-2.
Missing decorative planters on DECKs as shown in floor plan.
Misplaced door to 'TOI-1', it is rotated and not aligned as per floor plan.
Orientation of the main entrance door (foyer) is incorrect.
Orientation of the door to 'BED-2' is incorrect.
Orientation of the door to 'TOI-1' is incorrect.
Orientation of the door to 'UTILITY' is incorrect.
Proportion distortion in the 'KITCHEN' area, appears narrower than specified.
Proportion distortion in the hallway leading to 'BED-2' and its toilet.
Inconsistent wall thickness throughout the model.
Lack of realistic lighting and shadows.
